description:
It was discovered that GNU cflow was incorrectly handling memory cleanup
operations at the end of a compilation module. An attacker could possibly
use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.

cflow.description: Analyze control flow in C source files
Analyze control flow in C source files

title: GNU cflow vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
GNU cflow could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially
crafted input.
